Name: VR Audio Visualizer
About the game: You are welcome to enjoy an incredible world of sonic virtual reality. Look at visualization of your favorite songs and melodies with 6 impressive visualizers: Impressive Sphere Tune Circle Radio City Beat Detection Rainbow Sidescroller Controls: Start - Select Scene Key 'L' - Select MP3 or WAV Escape - Quit ← - Previous Scene → - Next Scene ↑ - Zoom + ↓ - Zoom -
